titleStmt.title: The history of independency, with the rise, growth, and practices of that powerfull and restlesse faction.
titleStmt.author: Walker, Clement, 1595-1651.

notesStmt.note: Part 2 appeared in 1649 under the title "Anarchia Anglicana"; part 3 in 1651 under the title "The high court of justice".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
